title: 1707: The Top 5 Reasons You Are Not Recovering
description:
In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin cover the main reasons why people do not properly recover.

  • The crucial missing piece to fitness success. (1:44)
  • Some clear signs that you may not be recovering properly. (4:10)
  • The Top 5 Reasons You Are Not Recovering.
  • #1 – Your workout programming is inappropriate for YOU. (9:40)
  • #2 – Poor sleep quality and your stress bucket may be full. (18:17)
  • #3 – You may not be meeting your nutritional needs. (26:48)
  • #4 – Your hormones may be out of balance. (31:52)
  • #5 - Not utilizing the RIGHT supplements. (35:08)
